title: SmartPlaylist Pattern Config
description: Top-level configuration file that maps podcasts to smart playlist definitions. Contains a version number and an array of pattern configs.

patterns.description: Array of pattern configs, each matching a podcast and defining its smart playlists.

SmartPlaylistPatternConfig.description: Matches a podcast by GUID or feed URLs and provides playlist definitions.

id.description: Unique identifier for this pattern config.

podcastGuid.description: Podcast GUID for exact matching. Checked before feedUrls.

yearGroupedEpisodes.description: Whether the all-episodes view groups by year.

SmartPlaylistDefinition.description: Defines a single smart playlist with resolver type, filters, groups, and display options.

id.description: Unique identifier for this playlist definition.

resolverType.description: Type of resolver to use for episode grouping.

oneOf.description: RSS Metadata: Groups episodes by their season number from RSS feed metadata (e.g., itunes:season). Best for podcasts that properly tag seasons in their feed.
Category: Groups episodes by matching their titles against regex patterns defined in the "groups" section. Use when episodes follow naming conventions like "Arc 1: ..." or "Mystery Series: ...".
Year: Groups episodes by their publication year. Good for long-running podcasts where yearly grouping is a natural fit.
Title Appearance Order: Groups episodes by a recurring pattern in their titles, ordered by when each pattern first appears in the feed. Useful for podcasts with titled story arcs or series.

priority.description: Controls episode claiming order among sibling playlists. Lower numbers are processed first and claim matching episodes before higher-numbered playlists. Playlists with filters are always processed before filter-less fallback playlists, regardless of priority value.

contentType.description: Content type: "episodes" for flat lists, "groups" for grouped display.

yearHeaderMode.description: How to determine year for year headers.

episodeYearHeaders.description: Whether to show year headers within episode lists.

showDateRange.description: Whether group cards display a date range.

titleFilter.description: Regex pattern to filter episode titles (include).

excludeFilter.description: Regex pattern to exclude episodes by title.

requireFilter.description: Regex pattern that episodes must match.

nullSeasonGroupKey.description: Group key assigned to episodes with null season.

groups.description: Static group definitions for category-based grouping.

customSort.description: Custom sort specification for this playlist. Only applies when contentType is "groups". Has no effect in episodes mode since there are no groups to sort.

titleExtractor.description: Configuration for extracting playlist display names from episode data. Not used by the category resolver, which uses static display names from group definitions.

smartPlaylistEpisodeExtractor.description: Configuration for extracting both season and episode numbers from title prefixes.

SmartPlaylistGroupDef.description: Static group definition. Groups with a pattern match episodes by title regex; without a pattern, acts as catch-all.

pattern.description: Regex pattern to match episode titles. Null means catch-all fallback.

episodeYearHeaders.description: Per-group override for episode year headers. Inherits from playlist when null.

showDateRange.description: Per-group override for date range display. Inherits from playlist when null.

SmartPlaylistSortSpec.description: Sort specification, either simple (single-field) or composite (multi-rule).

oneOf.description: Sort by group key (season number, year, etc.).
Sort by the most recent episode date in each group.
Sort by listening progress. Mobile-only; has no effect in web preview.
Sort alphabetically by group display name.

SmartPlaylistSortRule.description: A single rule in a composite sort.

oneOf.description: Sort by group key (season number, year, etc.).
Sort by the most recent episode date in each group.
Sort by listening progress. Mobile-only; has no effect in web preview.
Sort alphabetically by group display name.

condition.description: Optional condition for when this rule applies.

type.description: Condition type. "sortKeyGreaterThan" applies when the sort key exceeds the given value.

SmartPlaylistTitleExtractor.description: Extracts playlist display names from episode data using source field, regex, and templates.

pattern.description: Regex pattern to extract value from the source.

group.description: Capture group index from regex match (0 = full match).

fallback.description: Fallback extractor when this one fails.

SmartPlaylistEpisodeExtractor.description: Extracts both season and episode numbers from episode title prefixes. Useful for podcasts with unreliable RSS metadata.

pattern.description: Primary regex to extract both season and episode numbers.

seasonGroup.description: Capture group index for season number. Set to null to skip season extraction (episode-only mode).

episodeGroup.description: Capture group index for episode number.

fallbackSeasonNumber.description: Season number when primary pattern fails but fallback matches.

fallbackEpisodeCaptureGroup.description: Capture group for episode number in fallback.

fallbackToRss.description: Whether to fall back to RSS episodeNumber when no pattern matches.
